text: is it possible to stage a blog?

Does anyone know how HubSpot makes these PDF with embedded text fields and numeric inputs? <https://www.HubSpot.com/hubfs/HubSpot%20-%20The%20Digital%20Experience%20Audit%20Workbook.pdf?utm_campaign=customer-marketing&utm_medium=email&utm_content=134663306&utm_source=hs_email&hubs_offer=offers.HubSpot.com%2Fdigital-experience-audit&hubs_signup-url=offers.HubSpot.com%2Fdigital-experience-audit&hubs_signup-cta=f3507b84-ad3e-4df5-97a5-72550ac2860c&submissionGuid=e402f45d-f588-4848-b4ac-dcb9016d83ac&_ga=2.116256192.736637943.1624282612-238831008.1604347350&_conv_v=vi%3A1*sc%3A17*cs%3A1624282611*fs%3A1604675128*pv%3A23*exp%3A%7B%7D*ps%3A1619793952&_conv_s=si%3A17*sh%3A1624282611241-0.061202889798008364*pv%3A2|https://www.HubSpot.com/hubfs/HubSpot%20-%20The%20Digital%20Experience%20Audit%20Wor[…]conv_s=si%3A17*sh%3A1624282611241-0.061202889798008364*pv%3A2>
Looks like PDF form elements… Do you have Acrobat Pro? I imagine you could add them that way
I have access to Indesign but not Acrobat
i beg you, don’t create pdf forms :smile:
